import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./product.css"; // import Chart from "../../components/chart/Chart" // import {productData} from "../../dummyData" import { Publish } from "@material-ui/icons"; export default function Product() { const location = useLocation(); const menu = location.menu; return (

Menu

{/*

{menu.menutitle}
id: {menu._id}
sales: 0
active: {menu.stock ? 'Active' : 'Deactive'}
in stock: {menu.qty}
); }
